verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:5
verses.text: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:6
verses.text: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:7
verses.text: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:8
verses.text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:9
verses.text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.
